abstract: For those who believe in corporate karma, there was a cosmic chuckle Tuesday when the suit filed by Carl Icahn’s High River against Realogy, the company owned and controlled by Apollo Management Group, was made public. In classic litigator form, the lawsuit was filed in Delaware Chancery Court the Wednesday evening before Thanksgiving; this no doubt ruined someone’s holiday.
lead_paragraph: For those who believe in corporate karma, there was a cosmic chuckle Tuesday when the suit filed by Carl Icahn’s High River against Realogy, the company owned and controlled by Apollo Management Group, was made public. In classic litigator form, the lawsuit was filed in Delaware Chancery Court the Wednesday evening before Thanksgiving; this no doubt ruined someone’s holiday.
